detectors.description:
AuricRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow__1.sol#861-879) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow__1.sol#870)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow__1.sol#873)
